Congratulations to Czech Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Cyril Svoboda on his reelection as Czech foreign minister.
 The message sincerely wished him a greater success in his responsible work to raise the international prestige of the country.    
 It also expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations recently developing on good terms between the two countries would continue to develop by the two foreign ministries and concerted efforts.

Russian Duma Delegation Wraps Up Korea Visit
    Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the State Duma of the Russian Federation headed by Konstantin Kosachev, chairman of its International Affairs Committee, Saturday flew back after winding up its three-day DPRK visit.
 They were seen off at the airport by Hong So Hon, chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Parliamentary Group who is deputy to the SPA, officials concerned and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov and embassy officials.    
 During their stay here, they laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower and visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph and Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.
